thread.title: Jose Mourinho ready to hand Man United star new contract on one condition
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho ready to hand Man United star new contract on one condition

title: Jose Mourinho ready to hand Man United star new contract on one condition
text:
1 of 10 Manchester United fans are not happy with Jose Mourinho after drawing with Hull 
“He wants to stay and by all accounts Jose has told the board similar. He is on big wages here and would have to take a cut. 
“Carrick’s influence and experience in United’s engine room is undeniable, he’s a key player for the team." GETTY Jose Mourinho is keen to keep hold of Michael Carrick for an extra season GETTY Old Trafford chiefs want Michael Carrick to take a pay cut 
Jose Mourinho has made it clear to United bosses he would like the 35-year-old to stay on another season and the board are keen to respect his wishes, providing the former England international agrees to a smaller salary. 
The report claims Ryan Giggs, Paul Scholes and Rio Ferdinand all had to take pay cuts in their final few years at Old Trafford and United hope Carrick will follow suit. Related articles
